name: Icon Design System - Feather Icons
description:
Feather is a collection of simply beautiful open source icons. Each icon is designed on a 24x24 grid with an emphasis on simplicity, consistency, and flexibility.


https://feathericons.com


License

Feather is licensed under the MIT License.


--------------------------------------------------------


I'm not the official creation team of Feather Icons, just a fan who really likes and wants to share this amazing iconset.

Please check and support the official creator of Feather Icons.

Thank you.
